html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-06592023-06-23TC
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
SubjectAdministrative Monetary Penalties (Motor Vehicle Safety) Regulations
PrecisADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES (MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY) REGULATIONS in order to (1) designate provisions of the Act and the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations for which an administrative monetary penalty could be issued; (2) include flexible penalty amounts payable for a violation; and (3) include individual provisions with their own maximum amounts payable for a violation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0154 Publication Date: 2023-07-05
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Administrative Monetary Penalties (Motor Vehicle Safety) Regulations
precis: ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES (MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY) REGULATIONS in order to (1) designate provisions of the Act and the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations for which an administrative monetary penalty could be issued; (2) include flexible penalty amounts payable for a violation; and (3) include individual provisions with their own maximum amounts payable for a violation.
